argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | brsingle.1 | |- A e. _V |
| 2 |  | brsingle.2 | |- B e. _V |
| 3 |  | #P_df-singleton | |- Singleton = ( ( _V X. _V ) \ ran ( ( _V (x) _E ) (++) ( _I (x) _V ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_brxp | |- ( A ( _V X. _V ) B <-> ( A e. _V /\ B e. _V ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 4 | #P_mpbir2an | |- A ( _V X. _V ) B |
| 6 |  | #P_elsn | |- ( x e. { A } <-> x = A ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_ideq | |- ( x _I A <-> x = A ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_bitr4i | |- ( x e. { A } <-> x _I A ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3, 5, 8 | #P_brtxpsd3 | |- ( A Singleton B <-> B = { A } ) |
